content:
/>
XI.iii.1.A.1.g
.
Definition:  Interment
Interment
is the act of placing the remains of a deceased person in a final resting place.
Examples
:
Placing the remains of a deceased person’s body into a grave.
Placing the cremains (cremated remains) of a deceased person into a columbarium niche.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A  - General Information on Burial Benefits and Allowances
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
